paper_abstract: This paper addresses the problem of the H-infinity control of commensurate Fractional Order Systems (FOS). Along the lines of recent work on H-infinity norm computation for FOS, new extensions of the L-infinity and H-infinity. bounded real lemmas to FOS are given after stating the differences between those two norms. An H-infinity. state feedback control method based on the corresponding bounded real lemma is then proposed. The efficiency of this method is evaluated on numerical examples. (C) 2013 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: H-infinity analysis and control of commensurate fractional order systems
